newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT-CSFB cuts Hoechst estimates.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-CSFB cuts Hoechst estimates.

text.p: Earnings estimates for German chemicals giant Hoechst AG were cut at CS First Boston, a research note by analyst Penny Tattersall said on Tuesday.
Tattersal said she cut earnings per share estimates by around 20 percent, largely because the company's Hoechst Marion Roussel unit was not performing as well as previously expected.

For 1997, Tattersall cut to 3.2 marks from 4.3, for 1998 she cut to 4.1 marks from 5.2 and for 1999 she cut to 4.7 marks from 5.6. The CSFB analyst said lower earnings expectations had been factored into the stock but further underperformance was likely.
